data.name: Quake
data.description: A S.H.I.E.L.D. agent who disrupts the enemy team by weakening groups of foes and removing their advantages.

starItems.name: Quake
starItems.description: A S.H.I.E.L.D. agent who disrupts the enemy team by weakening groups of foes and removing their advantages.

1.description: Attack primary target and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>45%</color> damage. Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to primary target and adjacent targets.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets

2.description: Attack primary target and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>65%</color> damage. Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to primary target and adjacent targets.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets

3.description: Attack primary target and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>85%</color> damage. Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to primary target and adjacent targets.

4.description: Attack primary target and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>85%</color> damage. Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to primary target and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
4.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>15%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets

5.description: Attack primary target and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage. Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to primary target and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
5.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>25%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets

6.description: Attack primary target and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>125%</color> damage. Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to primary target and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
6.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>25%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets

7.description: Attack primary target and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage. Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to primary target and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>60%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect. <color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to Chain up to <color=#86e619>2</color> targets for <color=#86e619>40%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>25%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to additional targets

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>85%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect. <color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to Chain up to <color=#86e619>2</color> targets for <color=#86e619>60%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>25%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to additional targets

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect. <color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to Chain up to <color=#86e619>2</color> targets for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>25%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> chance to Chain
If Coulson or Yo-Yo is an ally, apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to primary target and secondary targets

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>135%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect. <color=#86e619>40%</color> chance to Chain up to <color=#86e619>2</color> targets for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect.

Counterattack breaks this Chain. If Coulson or Yo-Yo is an ally, apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to primary target and secondary targets.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>25%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to additional targets

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect. <color=#86e619>40%</color> chance to Chain up to <color=#86e619>2</color> targets for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect.

Counterattack breaks this Chain. If Coulson or Yo-Yo is an ally, apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to primary target and secondary targets.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>25%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to additional targets
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects from primary target
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects from additional targets

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>185%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects. <color=#86e619>40%</color> chance to Chain up to <color=#86e619>2</color> targets for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects.

Counterattack breaks this Chain. If Coulson or Yo-Yo is an ally, apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to primary target and secondary targets.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>25%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to additional targets

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects. <color=#86e619>40%</color> chance to Chain up to <color=#86e619>2</color> targets for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects.

Counterattack breaks this Chain. If Coulson or Yo-Yo is an ally, apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to primary target and secondary targets.

1.description: Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage. Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> on <color=#86e619>1</color> enemy for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn.

2.description: Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage. Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> on <color=#86e619>2</color> enemies for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn.

3.description: Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>190%</color> damage. Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> on <color=#86e619>2</color> enemies for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn.

4.description: Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>190%</color> damage. Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> on <color=#86e619>3</color> enemies for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn.

5.description: Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>270%</color> damage. Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> on <color=#86e619>3</color> enemies for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn.

6.description: Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>270%</color> damage. Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> on <color=#86e619>5</color> enemies for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn.

7.description: Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>320%</color> damage. Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> on <color=#86e619>5</color> enemies for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn.

1.description: Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Extra Focus. <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D.</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> damage.

2.description: Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Extra Focus. <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D.</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> damage.

3.description: Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Extra Focus. <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D.</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> damage. <color=#fff568>INHUMAN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Extra Focus.

4.description: Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Extra Focus. <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D.</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> damage. <color=#fff568>INHUMAN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Extra Focus.

5.description: Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Extra Focus. <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D.</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> damage. <color=#fff568>INHUMAN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Extra Focus.

item.name: Gold
